link.title: Richland Springs Independent School District - News
Middle School - News

input.name: __EVENTVALIDATION

p.span: RSISD and other schools of the Education Region Center 15 are in the process of transitioning to a new Parent Portal. Parent access to the portal should return next week. Questions about specific grades should be directed to teachers during this transition.

strong.span: Homebound Instruction Order Through End of Year

span.p: School districts continue to remain focused on the COVID-19 Public Health Crisis first and foremost. Guidelines have now become routines in our daily lives. Governor Abbott’s latest Executive Order requires all school districts to remain closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year.

p.span: If you want to receive an e-mail for local school information, please give your e-mail address to the school office or Mrs. Wyatt.

Materials will be packed individually per student and sorted in a box by teacher's name. The boxes will be placed on the benches in front of the library. Parents will pick up on Monday mornings between 8:00 am - 4:00 pm. This is ensure that families and teacher remain safe. Notifications will be made on Remind, Facebook, parent e-mails, and this website on which teachers have materials to pick up.

div.div:
This is a secure Staff Intranet content page and cannot be viewed by the public. Please contact your Technology Director to gain access to the Staff Intranet area in order to view this page.
Thank you,

div.span:
700 West Coyote Trail
Richland Springs, TX 76871
